overview:
Hezi Torati has successfully created, developed and implemented a series of innovative, cutting-edge real estate finance products in the United States and internationally.

Hezi Torati’s newest venture involves strategic investment in mortgage-related disputes in the form of non-recourse litigation financing. Mr. Hezi Torati’s company provides research, support, funding for legal and court fees, and other value-added services to select borrowers who wish to contest the validity of their mortgage debt and have the grounds to do so. Hezi Torati charges a percentage of the indebtedness the borrower saves, which can be paid in small monthly installments, and only recovers expenditures if the case resolves successfully.

“What I enjoy about this business, ” says Mr. Hezi Torati, “is the fact that it’s an example of private industry addressing a major, current socio-economic problem in a way that is both effective and highly ethical.”
